isis.stitle: Spanish - Guía para Localización de Fallas del Sistema Eléctrico - 3200, 4200, 4300, 4400, 7300, 7400, 7500, 8500, 8600 - POWER STEERING GEAR: SHEPPARD MODEL 292, 392, 492 - DISASSEMBLE - INTEGRAL SLAVE GEARS

svcproc.title: INTEGRAL SLAVE GEARS
svcproc.para: The Sheppard Integral Slave Gears are quite simple in operation and require few repairs.
The major components in the slave gear are the power piston and the pinion gear/output shaft assembly.

step1.para: Disassembly of the slave gear requires the removal of the cylinder heads and the pinion cover or mounting bracket.
The pinion gear/output shaft assembly is removed and the piston is pulled out of the housing bore.
The output shaft bearings are serviced using the same procedures used for the master gear.
